plan_summary: Multi-channel sequence with email warmup, LinkedIn engagement, and conditional voice escalation for high-fit enterprise lead

recommended_channel_sequence.reasoning: Email is appropriate for initial contact with VP-level persona; allows async review and sharing with team
recommended_channel_sequence.send_window: Business hours only (9 AM - 5 PM in lead's timezone)
personalization_signals: Company size indicates complex sales process
Persona responsibility for sales technology stack
recommended_channel_sequence.content_request: Professional email with value proposition focused on sales process optimization

recommended_channel_sequence.reasoning: LinkedIn engagement signals professional interest; persona is active on platform based on research
personalization_signals: Recent posts about sales team challenges
recommended_channel_sequence.content_request: LinkedIn connection request with brief value-focused note (200 chars max)

recommended_channel_sequence.goal: Provide specific use case and deepen engagement
recommended_channel_sequence.reasoning: Second email touchpoint with more specific value proposition based on research insights
personalization_signals: Specific pain point: manual sales qualification processes
recommended_channel_sequence.content_request: Follow-up email with case study or specific use case relevant to persona's responsibilities

recommended_channel_sequence.goal: Qualify lead via conversation and address specific concerns
recommended_channel_sequence.reasoning: High ICP score (92) and engagement signals warrant personal touch; voice enables real-time qualification
recommended_channel_sequence.send_window: Business hours only (avoid Monday mornings and Friday afternoons)
personalization_signals: Strong ICP fit indicates high conversion probability
recommended_channel_sequence.content_request: Voice call talking points covering: value prop, qualification questions (BANT), objection handling
gating_conditions: Engagement on 2+ previous channels (email open or LinkedIn connection)

voice_readiness.rationale: This lead meets all criteria for voice escalation: ICP score of 92, VP-level persona with confirmed decision authority, active buying signals detected, and engagement expected across email/LinkedIn. Voice is appropriate for deep qualification.

sequencing_logic.rationale: Progressive engagement strategy starting with async channels (email/LinkedIn) to build credibility, followed by voice for high-value leads showing engagement. Delays calibrated for enterprise buying cycles.
sequencing_logic.recommended_delays: 48-72 hours between email touches; 96+ hours before voice to allow time for multi-channel engagement assessment
